abstracts.cdata!:
The North China Earthquake
            Reconstruction Project will support a program to be carried
            out in 1990 and 1991 consisting of : a) a village
            reconstruction program for about 80 villages in the four
            counties of Shanxi Province's Yanbei Prefecture and
            about 70 villages in Hebei Province's Yangyuan County,
            including reconstruction of about 24,000 collapsed dwelling
            rooms, and rehabilitation, repair and reinforcement of about
            49,500 others, reconstruction of about 1200 public facility
            rooms and repair and reinforcement of about 1200 others,
            reestablishment and repair of critical village
            infrastructure of power lines and water supply and repair of
            damaged buildings of about a dozen rural enterprises in the
            five counties, and b) a national component of assistance for
            earthquake prediction and disaster relief preparedness,
            including upgrading and reinforcement of the State
            Seismological Bureau's national seismic monitoring
            network for monitoring and prediction and the drawing up of
            a model emergency preparedness plan for Yanbei prefecture.
